name: Syndicate:Rising
description:
This is a VERY early prototype of a working idea I have for a game set in my world. It'll be iterated upon as consistently as I can manage in my current situation, but I'd still appreciate any and all feedback provided.

Current features:
• Character Creator (female only for now)
• A (kinda) tutorial and a few different tasks to do
• A few NPCs to chat with
• A rather large section of the Storm Dragon Syndicate Headquarters to explore
• Combat training rooms
